name: Accept this Offering
description:
A puzzle turn-based game about goals, problems and sacrifice.

Use [ARROW KEYS] to move across the board.

And remember, with each step the world moves with you.

Made with Godot Engine 3.1 Alpha2

Graphics mostly derivative from Hand drawn icons by Colin Brown, edited with GIMP.

Sounds generated with sfxr.

Intro music from OpenGameArt

Game music: Favorite by Alexander Nakarada
